data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 2, Porto's Jesus Corona breaks free at Dom Afonso Henriques. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Guimaraes.
Throw-in for Porto in the half of Guimaraes.
In the minute 5, Free kick for Guimaraes in the half of Porto.
Goal! Rochinha gives Guimaraes a 1-0 lead.
Can Porto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guimaraes's half?
In the minute 9, In Guimaraes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Helder Malheiro awards Guimaraes a goal kick.
Ball safe as Porto is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 10, In Guimaraes Porto drive forward through Moussa Marega. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Guimaraes to take a throw-in in Porto territory.
Throw-in for Porto at Dom Afonso Henriques.
In the minute 12, Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
Romario Baro (Porto) has received a first yellow card.
Porto awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 14, Free kick for Guimaraes in their own half.
Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Porto.
In the minute 15, Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Porto in their own half.
Guimaraes's Gideon Mensah has been booked in Guimaraes.
Goal kick for Guimaraes at Dom Afonso Henriques.
Free kick Guimaraes.
In the minute 18, Mehdi Taremi of Porto smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Guimaraes drive forward but Oscar Estupinan is judged offside.
Helder Malheiro signals a Porto throw-in in Guimaraes's half.
In the minute 20, Guimaraes needs to be cautious. Porto have an attacking throw-in.
Can Porto capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Guimaraes's half?
Free kick for Guimaraes in the half of Porto.
In the minute 23, Porto awarded a free kick in their own half.
Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Porto.
Pepelu is booked for the home team.
In the minute 27, Porto are pushing forward but Romario Baro's finish is wide of the goal.
Guimaraes have a goal kick.
Free kick for Porto in their own half.
In the minute 28, Porto to take a throw-in in Guimaraes territory.
Corner awarded to Porto.
Can Porto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guimaraes's half?
In the minute 30, Porto have been awarded a corner by Helder Malheiro.
Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
The away team replace Pepe with Malang Sarr.
In the minute 32, Luis Diaz is on a sub for Romario Baro for Porto.
Throw-in for Guimaraes in the half of Porto.
Helder Malheiro signals a Guimaraes throw-in in Porto's half.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Porto close to the penalty box.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Porto.
In the minute 35, In Guimaraes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Helder Malheiro awards the home team a throw-in.
Porto's Mehdi Taremi misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 38, Ball goes out of play for a Guimaraes goal kick.
Throw-in for Porto in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Guimaraes goal kick.
In the minute 41, Can Porto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guimaraes's half?
Mehdi Taremi grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Dom Afonso Henriques.
Moussa Marega instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 45, In Guimaraes Porto attack through Mateus Uribe. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Guimaraes at Dom Afonso Henriques.
Porto awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick Porto.
Porto to take a throw-in in Guimaraes territory.
In the minute 45, Helder Malheiro signals a Porto throw-in in Guimaraes's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ricardo Quaresma for Guimaraes gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 45, Porto have a goal kick.
The first-half is over at Dom Afonso Henriques.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Guimaraes attack but Oscar Estupinan's header doesn't find the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Guimaraes.
Throw-in for Guimaraes in the half of Porto.
In the minute 48, Attention is being given to Porto’s Agustin Marchesin and play has been suspended briefly.
Agustin Marchesin is back on his feet again.
Guimaraes's Oscar Estupinan is whistled for offside at Dom Afonso Henriques.
In the minute 51, Porto push forward at Dom Afonso Henriques and Mehdi Taremi gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Guimaraes defence.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Porto's Sergio Oliveira gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 52, Helder Malheiro awards Guimaraes a goal kick.
Helder Malheiro awards Guimaraes a goal kick.
Helder Malheiro waits before resuming play because Jorge Fernandes for Guimaraes is still down.
In the minute 56, Joao Henriques (Guimaraes) is making a first change, with Easah Suliman replacing the possibly injured Jorge Fernandes.
Porto to take a throw-in in Guimaraes territory.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Guimaraes.
In the minute 60, Guimaraes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Porto have a goal kick.
Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Porto.
In the minute 62, Ball goes out of play for a Guimaraes goal kick.
Oscar Estupinan scores with a header and the home team now lead 2-1.
Great play from Ricardo Quaresma to set up the goal.
In the minute 65, Free kick for Porto in their own half.
Mehdi Taremi gets an equalizer for Porto. The score is now 2-2.
Luis Diaz with an assist there.
In the minute 66, Throw-in Porto.
Ball safe as Guimaraes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Porto in their own half.
In the minute 71, Sergio Conceicao is making the team's third substitution at Dom Afonso Henriques with Fabio Vieira replacing Sergio Oliveira.
Goal kick for Guimaraes at Dom Afonso Henriques.
Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Porto in their own half.
In the minute 73, Helder Malheiro awards the home team a throw-in.
Porto push upfield and Moussa Marega gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Guimaraes defence.
Porto's Luis Diaz gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 74, It's a goal kick for the home team in Guimaraes.
Moussa Marega of Porto is pulled up for offside.
Guimaraes make their second substitution with Miguel Luis replacing Andre Almeida.
In the minute 76, Porto awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Porto in the half of Guimaraes.
Porto have been awarded a corner by Helder Malheiro.
In the minute 78, Helder Malheiro signals a Porto throw-in in Guimaraes's half.
Can Porto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guimaraes's half?
In Guimaraes Porto attack through Fabio Vieira. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 79, Ball goes out of play for a Guimaraes goal kick.
Marcus Edwards is replacing Rochinha for the home team.
Luis Diaz puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 2-3.
In the minute 82, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Mehdi Taremi.
Porto’s Mehdi Taremi is on his feet again at Dom Afonso Henriques.
Free kick for Guimaraes in their own half.
In the minute 84, Mehdi Taremi is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Sergio Conceicao (Porto) has taken off Mehdi Taremi who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Marko Grujic is the replacement.
Throw-in for Guimaraes in their own half.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Porto in the half of Guimaraes.
Helder Malheiro signals a Guimaraes throw-in in Porto's half.
Can Porto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guimaraes's half?
Guimaraes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Porto awarded a throw-in in their own half.
At Dom Afonso Henriques the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Guimaraes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Porto in the half of Guimaraes.
Porto have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Guimaraes at Dom Afonso Henriques.
That's full-time at Dom Afonso Henriques. The final score is 2-3.
